name: Lightcycle (KittenBox, Amaan)
description:
NOTE: We are aware of the scoreboard nor working due to requests being blocked in the WebGL version. It will be fixed right after updates are reenabled.

Controls: WASD to move
Goal: Drive over enemies to collect them, avoid your trail

Squash those pesky robots from out of space with your state of the art light cycle. Dodge and weave your way through and squash them. Your light cycle will progressively get faster throughout the game, hold onto your hats!

But be careful! Getting hit will cause your cycle to leak precious fuel and coming into contact with this will cause you to take damage. Leak too much fuel and you may just get trapped...

There are pickups available throughout the waves as you progress these include
